name: Regression of the Yong Clan Heir
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: Yong Hwarin, debilitated by illness and weakness as the heir to the Tianzhong clan, ultimately gave up the path of martial arts and lived as a merchant after marrying into another family.Carrying his regrets until the time he met his end, he unexpectedly travels back to the past he thought he would never revisitâ€¦!Returning to the time of his lowest point, he swears to his shattered heart that his fate will be reborn through his own hands.Original Webtoon: Naver Webtoon, Naver Series
